messages.title: Re-Elect Jeff Smith This Thursday
messages.content: Jeff will continue to fight for a fair deal for Manchester.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight for a properly funded local police force and will vote to fund 10,000 extra police officers.
Labour created it and will give the NHS the resources it needs.
Fight against school cuts in South Manchester, ensuring schools are well funded.
Oppose any Brexit deal that doesn’t deliver for jobs and services in Manchester.
Fight for investment in renewable energy and a low carbon future.

issues.brexitEurope: Jeff will oppose any Brexit deal that doesn’t deliver for jobs and services in Manchester.
issues.education: Fight against school cuts in South Manchester, ensuring schools are well funded.
issues.environment: Fight for investment in renewable energy and a low carbon future.
issues.health: Labour created it and will give the NHS the resources it needs.
issues.lawCrime: Fight for a properly funded local police force and will vote to fund 10,000 extra police officers.

community.content: Jeff’s office is open to the public in the heart of Withington. Jeff and his team have dealt with over 10,000 enquiries in just two years. Holds weekly advice surgeries, regular ‘meet your MP’ coffee mornings, and frequently visits local schools and community groups.

leaflet.personalStatement: Jeff was born and bred in this area and has been proud to serve as your MP for the last two years.

politicalExperience.achievements: Dealt with over 10,000 enquiries, holds weekly advice surgeries, regular ‘meet your MP’ coffee mornings, and frequently visits local schools and community groups.

endorsements.endorser: Greater Manchester’s new Mayor Andy Burnham
endorsements.endorsement: Jeff is a strong voice for South Manchester in parliament. I know he will fight hard to protect local businesses, mental health, and the needs of older people.

examples: Our local police are under pressure – under the Tories and Lib Dems, Greater Manchester Police have lost a quarter of its workforce
Jeff’s office is open to the public in the heart of Withington. Jeff and his team have dealt with over 10,000 enquiries in just two years.
Jeff holds weekly advice surgeries, regular ‘meet your MP’ coffee mornings.
Jeff is a strong voice for South Manchester in parliament
He will fight hard to protect local businesses, mental health, and the needs of older people.
Fight for a fair deal for Manchester
Fight for a fair deal for Manchester.
Fight against school cuts in South Manchester.
Oppose any Brexit deal that doesn’t deliver for jobs and services in Manchester.
Fight for investment in renewable energy and a low carbon future.
Labour created it and will give the NHS the resources it needs.

personalStories.story: Jeff was born and bred in this area and has been proud to serve as your MP for the last two years.

examples: Greater Manchester’s new Mayor Andy Burnham endorses Jeff Smith.
Under the Tories and Liberal Democrats, Greater Manchester Police lost a quarter of its workforce.
More cuts to our struggling public services – or a Labour plan to invest in our future.
Jeff will oppose any Brexit deal that doesn’t deliver for jobs and services in Manchester.
